frontmatter.title: JAMstack. Modern way to create static sites
frontmatter.description: In this article, we will understand what JAMstack is and create a simple blog using GatsbyJS
frontmatter.foreword: Do you want to create blazing fast sites, using your favorite web framework, with support for the latest SEO, PWA and interface availability recommendations without writing a single line of server code? You are welcome!

headings.value: High load speed and fault tolerance
Blog development example Using Gatsby, Netlify, NetlifyCMS, and GitHub
Publish project using GitHub and Netlify
